attributes.action: Cancel asylum claims for anyone entering the UK illegally
attributes.background: Anyone entering the UK illegally should forfit their asylum claim. They are breaking the law and they encourage others to do the same. They have also traveled through safe countries on their journey to the UK. Asylum should have been claimed in one of these countries.

rejection.details:
The Government's New Plan for Immigration states that those who arrive in the UK, having passed through safe countries, or who have a connection to a safe country where they could have claimed asylum, will be considered inadmissible to the UK’s asylum system. The plan also states that the UK Government will seek rapid removal of inadmissible cases to the safe country from which they embarked or to another safe third country.

You can read the Government's New Plan for Immigration here: https://www.gov.uk/government/consultations/new-plan-for-immigration/new-plan-for-immigration-policy-statement-accessible
